word:
This meeting was well attended and there seemed to be a good interest among the people. We felt encouraged with the evidences manifested to take hold anew of the work of God. Here the subject of general camp meetings was introduced and they unanimously voted in favor of such meetings.--Ms 6, 1868, pp. 2, 3. ("Our Travels," May, 1868.) 

Released November 10, 1975.
